entry.title: Pianist Yunchan Lim wins French music award Diapason d'Or de l'Année
entry.content: Pianist Yunchan Lim was given the Diapason d'Or de l'Année, a French classical music award, his agency Moc Production said Monday. He was awarded in the Young Talent section, or Jeune Talent in French, for his recording of Chopin’s “Études Opp. 10 and 25,” which was released last April. The Diapason d’Or, or the Golden Tuning Fork in English, acknowledges exceptional classical music recordings judged by a jury of reviewers from the French magazine Diapason every month.
